org.eclipse.emailrecommender
Class Search

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager
      org.eclipse.core.commands.AbstractHandler
          org.eclipse.emailrecommender.Search
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.commands.IHandler, org.eclipse.core.commands.IHandler2
public class Search
extends org.eclipse.core.commands.AbstractHandler

Main class to implement search. It is registered as handler for the package explorer menu extension point. For the actual search in the DB, the PosgreSearch class methods are used.

Author:
vita

private void StrictRegexpSearch(java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                java.io.IOException

Parameters:

DictionarySearch

private void DictionarySearch(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.io.IOException
Does either Strict regexp search or simple Case sensitive search, based on whether the classname exists in English dictionary. (Uses dict in the db, actual search is implemented in the PosgreSearch class.)

Parameters:
path - - the entire path to the class
name - - classname
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.io.IOException
